thread.title: Philippe Coutinho: Barcelona stars Neymar and Luis Suarez have mystery conversation with Liverpool star
thread.title_full: Philippe Coutinho: Barcelona stars Neymar and Luis Suarez have mystery conversation with Liverpool star

author: achapman
title: Philippe Coutinho: Barcelona stars Neymar and Luis Suarez have mystery conversation with Liverpool star
text:
'What's the weather like?' Philippe Coutinho: Barcelona stars Neymar and Luis Suarez have mystery conversation with Liverpool star 
Coutinho has been strongly linked with moving to the Nou Camp this summer despite recently penning Liverpool deal Pictured 24th March 2017, 12:56 pm Updated: 24th March 2017, 12:57 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LIVERPOOL star Philippe Coutinho was spotted deep in conversation with Barcelona stars Neymar and Luis Suarez last night – but just what where the trio talking about? 
Barcelona have made no secret of their desire to bring Coutinho the Nou Camp – even though he signed a new Anfield contract earlier this season. NEYMAR JR: 
"Coutinho would be a great fit in the Barcelona system, he has everything to succeed with us. I would like him to join us." pic.twitter.com/X9Sb0sysZd 
— Seleção Brasileira (@BrazilStat) March 24, 2017 
Neymar admitted just yesterday that he would take his compatriot above any other Premier League star if given the choice. Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And this latest snap has set tongues wagging once again in the wake of Brazil’s 4-1 win over Uruguay in their World Cup qualifying clash. 
Suarez can be seen wish his hand on Coutinho’s shoulder as Neymar looks to get his two cents in. Watch for Philippe Coutinho bending down behind the wall to stop the ball going under it Getty Images 2 Neymar has recently admitted he wants Barcelona to sign Philippe Coutinho 
But maybe they were just reflecting on a crazy night of football in South America which saw Tottenham flop Paulinho score a spectacular hat-trick . 
Edinson Cavani opened the scoring for Uruguay with a penalty before Paulinho levelled the scores with a long-range strike. Most Read In Sport REAL PAIGE-TURNEr WWE leaked sex tape saga hots up as MORE raunchy videos and pics of ex-champ Paige are shared online sealing the deal Jose Mourinho pictured in Croatia as he bids to get £35million Ivan Perisic deal over the line ULTIMATE FLASHING CHAMPIONSHIP UFC ring girl Arianny Celeste goes TOPLESS on the beach as she soaks up sun in Mexico UniTeD MOVE LIKE GRIEZ LIGHTNIN' Man Utd close in on Antoine Griezmann with move said to be a formality X-RATED SHOCKER Paige sex tape bombshell as fans express outrage at 'sex act over WWE championship belt' Coleman career fear WARNING GRAPHIC: Seamus Coleman's leg broken by Neil Taylor horror tackle as Wales defender sent off in draw with Ireland Reuters 2 Paulinho scored a hat-trick as Brazil beat Uruguay 4-1 in a World Cup qualifier last night 
The Guangzhou Evergrande midfielder then put Brazil 2-1 up early in the second half before Neymar scored with a cheeky chip. 
Paulinho then grabbed his third of the evening in the dying moments, helping Brazil edge closer to qualification for next year’s World Cup in Russia.
